#summary Library dependency listing
#labels Phase-Requirements

= Minimum requirements =

  * Java 1.5 or later, preferably from Sun.
  * lib/xbird-db-xx.jar, lib/commons-logging-xx.jar

= Dependency to open source libraries =

The following libraries are required for building  the distribution package. 
The detail of the dependencies are as follows.

|| lib/[http://commons.apache.org/logging/ commons-logging-xx.jar] || used for logging functionality. || a bunch of classes || ASL 2.0 || yes ||
|| lib/optional/[https://args4j.dev.java.net/ args4j-xx.jar] || used for parsing command line arguments. This API is required only when you use XBird by command line. ||  [http://code.google.com/p/xbird/source/browse/trunk/xbird-open/main/src/java/xbird/client/InteractiveShell.java InteractiveShell] and [http://code.google.com/p/xbird/source/browse/trunk/xbird-open/main/src/java/xbird/client/command/CommandInvoker.java CommandInvoker] class || MIT || yes ||
